quote: I cut off hundreds of millions of dollars off one particular plane, hundreds of millions of dollars in a short period of time. It wasn't like I spent, like, weeks, hours, less than hours, and many, many hundreds of millions of dollars. And the plane's going to be better.
quotePlain: I cut off hundreds of millions of dollars off one particular plane, hundreds of millions of dollars in a short period of time. It wasn’t like I spent, like, weeks, hours, less than hours, and many, many hundreds of millions of dollars. And the plane’s going to be better.
name: Donald Trump
where: interview with Fox News' Sean Hannity

claims.title: Trump saved hundreds of millions on F-35
claims.negative: Trump didn't save hundreds of millions on F-35
claims.negativePlain: Trump didn’t save hundreds of millions on F-35
claims.truth: Most of the cuts were already planned.
claims.truthPlain: Most of the cuts were already planned.
